title: Doubts regarding recent email from college

comments.body:
This is peak PESU moment. 

No other words can possibly describe what is happening or the reason behind this. Good luck for your next 4 years cause you're going to fucking need it man 

* cries in PTSD *

Basically you have to pay 10k just so that you can get 43k back(if you come in top 20%). If you don't think you can don't pay. Many if my friends seen't just not worth wasting 10k. Btw PES did tell they will charge 20k extra after 1st sem. So yeah
How is 43k 25% or 20% of the tuition fee?
Regardless, the fact that you'd need to pay *any* amount to simply be eligible for a scholarship is downright wrong. Takes everything away from the concept of merit.
